section_title: Reporting, review and training of experts
sentences: SBSTA adopted conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2006/L.4). METHODOLOGICAL ISSUES (PROTOCOL): HFC-23: Chair Georg B rsting (Norway) noted that no agreement had yet been reached on guidance to the CDM Executive Board and that submissions on practical approaches to address this issue would be requested.
CHINA expressed disappointment at lack of progress.
Delegates then adopted conclusions on this matter (FCCC/SBSTA/2006/L.15).
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
